com.maxleap

类 MLUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxleap.MLUserManager

  • public final class MLUserManager
extends Object
    * This class provides the ability to manage the MLUser.

    • 方法详细资料

      • signUpInBackground

        public static void signUpInBackground(MLUser user,
                      SignUpCallback callback)
        Signs up a new user. A username and password must be set before calling signUp.
        参数:
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the signUp completes.

      • saveInBackground

        public static void saveInBackground(MLUser user,
                    SaveCallback callback)
        Saves the object to the server in a background thread.
        参数:
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the save completes.

      • saveInBackground

        public static void saveInBackground(MLUser user)
        Saves the object to the server in a background thread.
        参数:
        user - the user

      • fetchInBackground

        public static void fetchInBackground(MLUser user,
                     GetCallback callback)
        Fetches this object with the data from the server.
        参数:
        user - The fetched MLUser.
        callback - callback.done(object, e) is called when the fetch completes.

      • deleteInBackground

        public static void deleteInBackground(MLUser user,
                      DeleteCallback callback)
        Deletes this object on the server in a background thread.
        参数:
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the save completes.

      • deleteInBackground

        public static void deleteInBackground(MLUser user)
        Deletes this object on the server in a background thread.
        参数:
        user - the user

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(String username,
                     String password,
                     LogInCallback callback)
        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using MLUser.getCurrentUser()
        参数:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the login completes.

      • logInInBackground

        public static <T extends MLUser> void logInInBackground(String username,
                                        String password,
                                        Class<T> clazz,
                                        LogInCallback callback)
        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using MLUser.getCurrentUser()
        参数:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        clazz - a class inherits MLUser
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the login completes.

      • requestPasswordResetInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetInBackground(String email,
                                    RequestPasswordResetCallback callback)
        Requests a password reset email to be sent in a background thread to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely reset their password on the ML site.
        参数:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestEmailVerifyInBackground

        public static void requestEmailVerifyInBackground(String email,
                                  RequestEmailVerifyCallback callback)
        Requests a verify email to be sent in a background thread.
        参数:
        email - The email address for verifying.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • becomeInBackground

        public static void becomeInBackground(String sessionToken,
                      LogInCallback callback)
        Authorize a user with a session token. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using MLUser.getCurrentUser()
        参数:
        sessionToken - The session token to authorize with.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the authorization completes.

      • checkPasswordInBackground

        public static void checkPasswordInBackground(String username,
                             String password,
                             CheckPasswordCallback callback)
        Check if the password matches the username in a background thread.
        参数:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • checkUsernameExistInBackground

        public static void checkUsernameExistInBackground(String username,
                                  ValidateUsernameCallback callback)
        Check if the username has already registered on the server in a background thread.
        参数:
        username - the username
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • changePasswordInBackground

        public static void changePasswordInBackground(String username,
                              String oldPassword,
                              String newPassword,
                              ChangePasswordCallback callback)
        Change the password in a background thread.
        参数:
        username - the username
        oldPassword - the old password
        newPassword - the new password
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestSmsCodeInBackground

        public static void requestSmsCodeInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                              RequestSmsCodeCallback doneCallback)
        Requests a sms code to be sent in a background thread to the specified phone number.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that sms code to be sent.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • verifySmsCodeInBackground

        public static <T extends MLUser> void verifySmsCodeInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                                String smsCode,
                                                VerifySmsCodeCallback doneCallback)
        Verify the sms code associate associated with the phone number in a background thread.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that associated with the sms code.
        smsCode - The sms code that received.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestLoginSmsCodeInBackground

        public static void requestLoginSmsCodeInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                   RequestSmsCodeCallback doneCallback)
        Requests a login sms code to be sent in a background thread to the specified phone number.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that sms code to be sent.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • loginWithSmsCodeInBackground

        public static void loginWithSmsCodeInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                String smsCode,
                                LogInCallback doneCallback)
        Logs in a user with a phone number and sms code. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using MLUser.getCurrentUser().
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that associated with the sms code.
        smsCode - The sms code that received.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestPhoneVerifyInBackground

        public static void requestPhoneVerifyInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                  RequestPhoneVerifyCallback doneCallback)
        Requests a verify sms code to be sent in a background thread.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that sms code to be sent.
        doneCallback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • verifyPhoneInBackground

        public static void verifyPhoneInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                           String smsCode,
                           VerifyPhoneCallback doneCallback)
        Verify the sms code associate associated with the phone number in a background thread.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that associated with the sms code.
        smsCode - The sms code that received.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestPasswordResetByPhoneNumberInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetByPhoneNumberInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                                 RequestPasswordResetCallback doneCallback)
        Requests a password reset sms code to be sent in a background thread to the specified phone number associated with the user account. This sms code allows the user to securely reset their password on the ML site.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that associated with the sms code.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestResetPasswordInBackground

        public static void requestResetPasswordInBackground(String phoneNumber,
                                    String smsCode,
                                    String newPassword,
                                    ResetPasswordCallback doneCallback)
        Requests reset the password in a background thread. This sms code allows the user to securely reset their password on the ML site.
        参数:
        phoneNumber - The phone number that associated with the sms code.
        smsCode - The sms code that received.
        doneCallback - doneCallback.done(e) is called when the request completes.
